Package com.here.sdk.mapview.datasource

Interface LineTileSource

  • All Superinterfaces:
    TileSource
    public interface LineTileSource
extends TileSource

    A source of geodetic line tiles. Lines provided by an implementation must be clipped to the boundaries of the requested tile. The implementations must be thread-safe.

    Note: This is a beta release of this feature, so there could be a few bugs and unexpected behavior. Related APIs may change for new releases without a deprecation process.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes

    • Method Detail

      • loadTile

        @Nullable
TileSource.LoadTileRequestHandle loadTile​(@NonNull
                                          TileKey tileKey,
                                          @NonNull
                                          LineTileSource.LoadResultHandler completionHandler)

        Load data of a tile. Upon completion, the handler gets informed.

        Parameters:
        tileKey -

        Key of the tile to load data for.

        completionHandler -

        Load result handler.

        Returns:

        A handle to the created load request.
